page.title: 12Events in Llangunllo
page.content: Most of the annual events in Llangunllo are held in the Church Hall .Run by different organisations, they are attended by the whole community. Early December brings the Church Bazaar followed later that month by a Poultry Whist_Drive with players from miles around. March brings a W.I. Quiz involving a number of neighbouring institutes; in June, the Mothers Union Jumble Sale; July, the Church Fete and Sprots Day with a Dog Show a week later. The Community Sports, including clay_pigeon shooting and a Rounders League, raises money for local charities in August.Â£450 was raised in 1985 and the cheques are presented at the Harvest Supper after the Festival service in September. Most of the money went to the Midlands Spinal Unit, where a local boy recieved treatment this year.
